The Covid Tracking Project https://covidtracking.com/data/download

```{bash}
mv ~/Downloads/daily.csv data/2020-07-16_covidtracking.com_all-states.csv
```

```{r}
covidRaw <- read.csv("data/2020-07-16_covidtracking.com_all-states.csv")
covid <- data.frame(covidRaw)
covid$date <- as.Date(as.character(covid$date), format="%Y%m%d")
covid <- covid[order(covid$date),]
covid$positiveIncreasePct <- covid$positiveIncrease/covid$totalTestResultsIncrease
covid$day = weekdays(covid$date)

wi <- covid[covid$state == 'WI',]
wi60 <- tail(wi, 60)

fl <- covid[covid$state == 'FL',]
fl60 <- tail(fl, 60)

az <- covid[covid$state == 'AZ',]
az60 <- tail(az, 60)
```

# Positive Tests
```{r}
plot(wi60$date, wi60$positiveIncreasePct, type="l", col="green", ylim=c(0, 0.45), xlab="Dates", ylab="Hospitalizations")
lines(wi60$date, fl60$positiveIncreasePct, type="l", col="red")
lines(wi60$date, az60$positiveIncreasePct, type="l", col="blue")
legend(x="topleft", legend=c("WI", "FL", "AZ"), col=c("green", "red", "blue"), lty=1)
```

# Hospitalizations Increase
```{r}
plot(wi60$date, wi60$hospitalizedIncrease, type="l", col="green", ylim=c(0, 500), xlab="Dates", ylab="Hospitalizations")
lines(wi60$date, fl60$hospitalizedIncrease, type="l", col="red")
lines(wi60$date, az60$hospitalizedIncrease, type="l", col="blue")
legend(x="topleft", legend=c("WI", "FL", "AZ"), col=c("green", "red", "blue"), lty=1)
```


# Test Increases
```{r}
plot(wi60$date, wi60$totalTestResultsIncrease, type="l", col="green", ylim=c(0, 100000), xlab="Dates", ylab="Hospitalizations")
lines(wi60$date, fl60$totalTestResultsIncrease, type="l", col="red")
lines(wi60$date, az60$totalTestResultsIncrease, type="l", col="blue")
legend(x="topleft", legend=c("WI", "FL", "AZ"), col=c("green", "red", "blue"), lty=1)
```
